1370: Deghen was born in Corte gracht in 1370.
Got married to Aue at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Aue, Douwen, at age 19.
1375: Had a son with Aue, Everdey, at age 23.
1376: Had a daughter with Aue, Siwa, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Aue, Douwen, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Aue, Iris, at age 26.
1379: Had a daughter with Aue, Soeten, at age 27.
Lost daughter Siwa when Siwa was 4 years old.
Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 3 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Aue, Kerstine, at age 28.
1381: Had a son with Aue, Hollander, at age 29.
Lost daughter Kerstine when Kerstine was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Had a daughter with Aue, Hille, at age 31.
1385: Had a daughter with Aue, Margareta, at age 33.
1392: Lost son Hollander when Hollander was 12 years old.
1393: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 23 years old.
